coalcamps.dao.hibernateImpls

Class CoalCampDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • coalcamps.dao.hibernateImpls.CoalCampDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoalCampDAO

    public class CoalCampDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CoalCampDAO
    Implements database access routines using hibernate for the CoalCamp class. Routines are transaction protected using begin, commit and rollback. Exceptions in hibernate routines (such as save, getResultList and delete) are caught and handled.
    Author:
    Mike Sheliga 4.9.18

      • getCoalCamps

        public java.util.List<CoalCamp> getCoalCamps()
        Return a list of all CoalCamps using the default initialization scheme. If lazy initialization is the default, companyBuilding will not be initialized.
        Specified by:
        getCoalCamps in interface CoalCampDAO
        Returns:
        a List of all coal camps using default initialization for companyBuilding.

      • getCoalCamps

        public java.util.List<CoalCamp> getCoalCamps(boolean eager)
        Return all coalCamps either with or without the companyBuilding already fetched. CompanyBuilding is a foreign key that will be fetched based upon the eager parameter.
        Specified by:
        getCoalCamps in interface CoalCampDAO
        Parameters:
        eager - A boolean indicating if eager loading of the building CoalCompany should occur.
        Returns:
        A list of all coal camps.

      • getCoalCampCount

        public int getCoalCampCount()
        Returns a count of the number of CoalCamps in the database.
        Specified by:
        getCoalCampCount in interface CoalCampDAO
        Returns:
        an int representing the number of database coal camps.

      • updateCoalCamp

        public void updateCoalCamp(CoalCamp camp)
        Updates the data in a CoalCamp
        Specified by:
        updateCoalCamp in interface CoalCampDAO
        Parameters:
        camp - a CoalCamp that is to updated in the database.

      • deleteCoalCamp

        public void deleteCoalCamp(CoalCamp camp)
        Deletes the CoalCamp from the database. An exception will be thrown and handled if this camp is used in other tables (such as the camp lease table). In this case the coal camp will not be deleted.
        Specified by:
        deleteCoalCamp in interface CoalCampDAO
        Parameters:
        camp - the CoalCamp that is to deleted from the hibernate database.
